ModMetaData.name: Job Satisfaction
ModMetaData.author: Lewkah0
ModMetaData.description: Ever felt that sense of accomplishment and relief after finishing a big project or completing a long chore? Now, your colonists can experience that same emotional reaction! With this mod, your colonists will get a meaningful mood boost after completing significant and lengthy tasks. Watch as your hardworking pawns feel a sense of pride and accomplishment from their efforts, contributing to a more immersive and engaging gameplay experience.
